## OIT.applyUniforms() method

Applies the uniforms for the given draw context and bind group.

This function will be called when ever the transparent material will upload uniform variables.

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract applyUniforms(ctx: DrawContext, bindGroup: BindGroup): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ctx | [DrawContext](doc/markdown/./scene.drawcontext.md) | The draw context. |
|  bindGroup | [BindGroup](doc/markdown/./device.bindgroup.md) | The bind group. |

**Returns:**

any
